summary:
Lily: Could you do something for me?
James: Of course, absolutely, not a problem. Whatever needs doing.
Lily: Could you please...
body:
Lily: Could you do something for me?
James: Of course, absolutely, not a problem. Whatever needs doing.
Lily: Could you please shut up?
James: 
James: Yes, I can do that. Of course, I can. That's not a problem.
Lily: NOW!

dialogue.name: James

tags: the most noble and ancient house of black
summary: Remus: My advice is don't be overconfident. The first time I met Sirius' parents I called my drink Firewhiskey, when it was...
body:
Remus: My advice is don’t be overconfident. The first time I met Sirius’ parents I called my drink Firewhiskey, when it was obviously Dragon Barrel Brandy. They haven’t spoken to me since.

Harry: Really? Just for that?

Remus: Yes.

Remus: Also because they’re huge homophobes who think that I made Sirius gay with my magic genitalia.

summary: The year is 1981, Voldemort is at the height of his power, the war has been raging for eleven years with no clear end in...
caption:
The year is 1981, Voldemort is at the height of his power, the war has been raging for eleven years with no clear end in sight.Destroying one Horcrux gave the Order time, but with the others out of reach and the Chosen One gone, can anyone find a silver lining?

Silver Lining is an AU Marauders era site set to open on August 15th! Join us for buzz, previews, and reservations.

summary: Spoglądała przed siebie, patrząc na najważniejsze miejsce w jej życiu.
body:
Spoglądała przed siebie, patrząc na najważniejsze miejsce w jej życiu.

Miejsce, które stało się jej domem.

Miejsce, w którym dowiedziała się tylu cudownych rzeczy.

Miejsce, w którym przeżyła tyle przygód.

Miejsce, w którym poznała prawdziwych przyjaciół.

Miejsce, z którym wiąże się tyle pięknych, ale i bolesnych wspomnień.

Miejsce, w którym czuła się bezpiecznie.

Miejsce, które teraz jest ruiną i cmentarzem.

Chciała płakać.

Chciała wylewać słone łzy, z nadzieją, że poczuje się choć trochę lepiej.

Ale nie mogła.

Łzy nie chciały wypłynąć, zdawało jej się, że wypłakała już wszystkie. Ogrom wojny i strat, jakie ponieśli, przytłoczył ją tak bardzo, że nie potrafiła się pozbierać. Nie potrafiła otrząsnąć się po tym koszmarze. Brakowało jej sił, czuła się pusta.

Opłakiwała zmarłych, ale sama nie potrafiła żyć.

W każdym razie jeszcze nie teraz.

Po chwili poczuła, jak ktoś siada obok niej.

- Kiedyś będzie lepiej - odezwał się głos obok niej - Wciąż będzie bolało, ale będzie lepiej.

Odwróciła głowę w kierunku chłopaka i pokiwała głową. A później przez długie godziny patrzyli w dal, siedząc na Wieży Astronomicznej.

Nie rozmawiali.

Po prostu byli tam dla siebie. Niegdyś dwojka wrogów, teraz - sprzymierzeńcy w bólu: Hermiona Granger i Draco Malfoy.

summary: Honestly my Pottermore results still fuck me up to this day.  Like, sure, someone could pin me in Ravenclaw within 5 minutes of...
caption:
Honestly my Pottermore results still fuck me up to this day.  Like, sure, someone could pin me in Ravenclaw within 5 minutes of meeting me, I’m like a prime stereotype of that House, but like

I have a patronus only I myself (trust me, I’ve been through shit) and a select few other people could ever see.  Not only that, but a wand made of Ash and Phoenix feather that is 14 ½ inches long.  For reference the GODDAMN ELDER WAND, the (edit) second longest (and most powerful, though no correlation) wand there is, is 15 inches, and 14 ½ is the longest wand length Pottermore will give out.  That’s longer than most people’s forearms.

Also, let me backpedal a bit and focus on its make.  ASH and goddamn PHOENIX FEATHER.  Let me get this straight, my wand is carved from Ash, described as a material that “cleaves to its one true master and ought not to be passed on or gifted from the original owner, because it will lose power and skill”, and Phoenix Feather, a core that is “always the pickiest when it comes to potential owners, for the creature from which they are taken is one of the most independent and detached in the world. These wands are the hardest to tame and to personalise, and their allegiance is usually hard won”.

I have a Patronus almost nobody can see and a powerful wand only I can use.

What am I?!

reblog.comment:

Also, let me backpedal a bit and focus on its make.  ASH and goddamn PHOENIX FEATHER.  Let me get this straight, my wand is carved from Ash, described as a material that “cleaves to its one true master and ought not to be passed on or gifted from the original owner, because it will lose power and skill”, and Phoenix Feather, a core that is “always the pickiest when it comes to potential owners, for the creature from which they are taken is one of the most independent and detached in the world. These wands are the hardest to tame and to personalise, and their allegiance is usually hard won”.

I have a Patronus almost nobody can see and a powerful wand only I can use.

What am I?!

Reprints // AO3 / FFnet / Wattpad

When J.K. Rowling’s Wizarding World
meets Ernest Hemingway’s six-word wonders,
the result is more than just magical.

A collection of six-word ficlets based on the Harry Potter books.

Status: ONGOING

Chapter List - Book 1:
01 // 02 // 03 // 04 // 05 // 06 // 07 // 08 // 09 // 10 // 11 // 12 // 13 // 14 // 15 // 16

Chapter List - Book 3:
X

Chapter List - Book 7:
A // B

6 Words by Tsubasa Kurono.

tags: here's a sad lad for you all
ship: harry realised with a shock so huge it seemed to root him to the spot that malfoy was crying
summary: “And Harry realised, with a shock so huge it seemed to root him to the spot, that Malfoy was crying – actually crying – tears...
caption: “And Harry realised, with a shock so huge it seemed to root him to the spot, that Malfoy was crying – actually crying – tears streaming down his pale face into the grimy basin. Malfoy gasped and gulped and then, with a great shudder, looked up into the cracked mirror and saw Harry staring at him over his shoulder.“

reblog.comment: “And Harry realised, with a shock so huge it seemed to root him to the spot, that Malfoy was crying – actually crying – tears streaming down his pale face into the grimy basin. Malfoy gasped and gulped and then, with a great shudder, looked up into the cracked mirror and saw Harry staring at him over his shoulder.“

trail.content_raw: “And Harry realised, with a shock so huge it seemed to root him to the spot, that Malfoy was crying – actually crying – tears streaming down his pale face into the grimy basin. Malfoy gasped and gulped and then, with a great shudder, looked up into the cracked mirror and saw Harry staring at him over his shoulder.“
trail.content: “And Harry realised, with a shock so huge it seemed to root him to the spot, that Malfoy was crying – actually crying – tears streaming down his pale face into the grimy basin. Malfoy gasped and gulped and then, with a great shudder, looked up into the cracked mirror and saw Harry staring at him over his shoulder.“

summary: Book 1: A Girl Like Constance McMahon
title: Book 1: A Girl Like Constance McMahon
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2LXkFF9

by Uneducated394

A girl from Glasgow, who moved to London, who is afflicted with a rare condition, discovers that she is a witch and goes to Hogwarts.

READ THE AUTHOR NOTE PLZ

Words: 3778, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - Fandom, Dogma, Babysitters Club, WWE
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence

  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Severus Snape, Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, Minerva McGonagall/Tom Riddle, George Weasley/Hermione Granger
  • Additional Tags: Self-Insert, Not a Mary-Sue
